org.svvrl.goal.core.util

Class XMLUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.util.XMLUtil

  • public class XMLUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides utility methods for manipulating XML files.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

                                    Editable obj)
                             throws CodecException
        Decodes other properties of an editable object from an XML element.
        Parameters:
        e - an XML element that represents the properties
        obj - an editable object
        Throws:

        Saves an XML node to an output stream.

        props - XML output options (may be null)
        Throws:
